## Introduction

`SEAPSUTWorkflow` is an `R` package that provides functions to build
a database of energy conversion chain (ECC) analyses.
`SEAPSUTWorkflow` makes use of the [drake](https://books.ropensci.org/drake/)
package to ensure that "What gets done stays done."


## Getting started

To get started, create an `R` project in a new folder.



data must be obtained and pulled into an R data frame.
